util
Class FileChooserFilter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      util.FileChooserFilter
public class FileChooserFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter

This class provides a simple javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter implementation that accepts files based on their extension, or if they are a directory (to allow traversal of the filesystem). multiple permissible extensions can be specified.

Author:
Graeme Bell

Method Detail

accept

public boolean accept(java.io.File f)
This implements javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter functionality. It accepts files based on their extension and also if they are directories.

Parameters:
f - the file to be checked for having a suitable extension or for being a directory.
Returns:
true if file matches extension/is a directory. false otherwise.

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
This is used to provide the JFileChooser with information on what the accept mapping represents.

Returns:
a String describing this FileFilters mapping.
